channel.title: Learn Unreal on Robin Smith
channel.description: Recent content in Learn Unreal on Robin Smith

item.title: Setup
item.description: In order to be able to develop with Unreal engine, we first need to get it set up and learn how to navigate the editor before starting to actually make anything in it. This post is just a quick overview of where to install it and basic controls. Installation The Epic games launcher is required to be able to download versions of the Unreal engine which can be found HERE. It should detect your OS and present the appropriate download option for you.
